source_objects.title: Microsoft
source_objects.description: Become proficient in Microsoft tools: Windows, Sharepoint, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project and more.

items.title: Microsoft Excel for Complete Beginners w/ Case Studies

visible_instructors.name: Travis
visible_instructors.title: Travis Chow
visible_instructors.job_title: Tech Veteran Mentoring & Teaching for 20+ Years

items.headline: Master or review Excel with 10 real world case studies. Packed with supplemental material for analysts.
objectives_summary: Learn and master Excel from complete beginner to advance
Walk through 10 real-world business case studies
Cover all Excel essential features with Foundation Series

items.title: Sharper skills using Microsoft Excel 2010 for business
items.headline: Learn how to effectively use Microsoft Excel 2010 to modify, analyze and visualize business data
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will know how to effectively use Microsoft Excel 2010 to:
Easily navigate spreadsheets
Quickly find answers by sorting and filtering data

items.title: Ultimate Excel Waterfall Chart Course
items.headline: Impressive Excel Waterfall Charts for Your Reports - From Scratch. No Add-ins, No VBA - For ANY Excel Version!
objectives_summary: Include impressive & dynamic variations of the Waterfall chart in your Management Reports
Create the standard Waterfall Chart from scratch (that works with negative values as well)
Download the Excel Template and use it now for your reports

items.title: PowerPoint Animation Deep Dive: Office Ninja Training
items.headline: Bring Emphasis and Subtly to your Presentation game
objectives_summary: Solidify your understanding of PowerPoint fundamentals
Explore all animation types and when they would be useful
Uncover subtle advanced techniques that make animations seemless

items.title: Excel Shortcuts, Hacks & Tricks: 100+ Powerful Excel Tips

visible_instructors.name: Andreas
visible_instructors.title: Andreas Exadaktylos
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Teacher | Msc Computer Scientist

items.headline: Master Excel with 100+ Excel Tips & Hacks, from an Excel Best Seller Instructor. Excel Project Files included.
objectives_summary: Maximize the power of Excel with 100+ ready-to-use tips Hacks on Excel Interface, Workbooks, Worksheets, Formatting Secrets, Organizing Data etc
Increase your Productivity and be more Efficient than you ever imagined
Accomplish and Master all of your Excel Tasks

items.title: Microsoft Excel - 40 Exercises for beginners. Learn by doing
items.headline: Learning by doing with Excel exercises! A practical approach to learn Microsoft Excel for beginners.
objectives_summary: How to use Excel as an efficient tool. The best way to learn is with practical exercises.
Master Microsoft Excel from Beginner to Advanced
Learn the most common Excel functions used in the Office

items.title: Ultimate Microsoft Excel Course: Beginner to Excel Expert
items.headline: Master Excel with this Complete Excel Course. Learn Everything Right Now (Workbooks and Real-World Exercises included).
objectives_summary: Become a Confident and Well-Rounded Excel user
Learn new techniques that you will be able to apply right way
Learn to write Excel formulas from scratch, up to to rock star level

items.title: 100% Effective Excel Tricks & Tools Crash Course [2021]
items.headline: Excel Tools & Tricks to increase Productivity & Save Time. Become Excel PRo Using Excel Ninja Tricks (2013, 2016, 2019)
objectives_summary: •	20+ Tools to help you automate, streamline, and absolutely revolutionize your workflow with Excel
•	Explore 20+ unique tools and case studies that you won't find in ANY other Excel course, guaranteed
•	MASTER HYPERLINKED WORKBOOK – All sheets as one place (won’t find in any Course)

items.title: PowerPoint Slide Zoom Course
items.headline: Start Creating Stunning PowerPoint Presentations Today!
objectives_summary: You will be able to tell engaging visual stories with the help of Slide Zoom
You will be able to convey their messages in a much more attractive way with help of Slide Zoom
You will be able to stand out from the crowd every time thanks to the Slide Zoom

items.title: Excel Charts, Graphs & Data Visualization in Excel

visible_instructors.name: Andreas
visible_instructors.title: Andreas Exadaktylos
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Teacher | Msc Computer Scientist

items.headline: Master 20+ Advanced Dynamic Excel Charts and Create Impressive Excel Graphs & Data Visualization in Microsoft Excel
objectives_summary: Create designer-quality Charts in Microsoft Excel with real-world examples. BONUS: Excel Workbook files + Sample files included
Improve general Excel knowledge
Learn from an instructor with over 16 years of experience with Microsoft Excel, teaching thousands of students in his own computer learning school

items.title: Microsoft Project 13/16/19 - Like a Boss (Exam 74-343 prep)

visible_instructors.name: Brian
visible_instructors.title: Brian Culp
visible_instructors.job_title: 100k+ students • 3M+ student minutes • MS Certified Trainer

items.headline: From Beginner to Boss with Project 2013, 2016, 2019. Incl. keyboard shortcuts and many Quick Reference Guides.
objectives_summary: Prepare for and pass the 74-343 exam
Configure project tasks
Create a project schedule

items.title: Mastering Microsoft Exchange Server 2013
items.headline: Learn how to setup, manage and secure a Microsoft Exchange Server. A definitive guide to working with MS Exchange Server
objectives_summary: Learn how to set-up, administrate and secure a Microsoft Exchange Server

items.title: Powerpoint 2010
items.headline: Microsoft's business presentation application PowerPoint simplifies the task of adding an extra appeal to Presentations.
objectives_summary: Being Able to Present PowerPoint Presentations with Confidence

items.title: Maximize your Organisational Skills using Excel Sheets
items.headline: Master sheet control, duplication & transfer techniques giving you full data and maximized organisational abilities!
objectives_summary: Adding new sheets
Deleting sheets
Renaming sheets

items.title: Microsoft Excel Step by Step Training for Beginners!
items.headline: Learn all the basics of Microsoft Excel and begin creating amazing templates and tables in just a few hours!!
objectives_summary: Basic controls – Opening Excel, Navigation, Scrolling Zooming
A Quick Glimpse of the Power of Excel – Full Table Design, fill handle, Autosums, Basic Formula’s, Formatting, Wordart, Status Bar
The Quick Access Toolbar – Productivity Tool, Keyboard Shortcuts

items.title: Microsoft EXCEL, POWERPOINT, WORD And Windows 10. 4-in-1
items.headline: Learn the most powerful functions in the most used software - Microsoft. Complete Collection. From beginner to advanced.
objectives_summary: WORD
How to get started with MS Word.
Learn how to get use to the interface and configure your settings.
